name.text:
Zoster: Dose #1 of RZV administered 4 weeks after previous dose of ZVL
Evaluation_Test_Type: Interval: At Absolute Minimum
General_Description: This test case describes when a patient is administered the first dose of RZV (Shingrix) at 4 weeks after a previous dose of ZVL (Zostavax), that the dose is considered valid. Per current guidance, RZV is recommended to be spaced 8 weeks after ZVL, but it does not need to be repeated if administered at any point prior to that 8 weeks up to and including the same day.
